member.name: T:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper
member.summary: This class is used by the WSRE_Processor to update the WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG and WSRE_SEQUENCE table. It uses the Struct_to_Table helper to update the tables using the WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG_STRUCT, WSRE_SEQUENCE_STRUCT. This class is also responsible for assigning the copyto job which is done using the WSRE_COPY_TO_JOB_STRUCT structure.

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper.#ctor(IRU.CommonInterfaces.IDBHelper,IRU.RTS.WSRE.WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG_STRUCT,IRU.RTS.WSRE.WSRE_SEQUENCE_STRUCT)
member.summary: Stores references to the Internal DB Helper, WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG_STRUCT and WSRE_SEQUENCE_STRUCT used by then WSRE_Processor class

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper.CleanInternalDBForFailure(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Called by WSRE_Processor in the clean up stage of processing deletes rows in WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG and WSRE_SEQUENCE table for the SAFETIR_MESSAGE_IN_ID value stored in the structure
member.param: Out parameter, returns count of rows affected

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper.LogSafeTIRfileContentsinInDB(System.String[])
member.summary: Uses the StrucToTable class to update the WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG and WSRE_SEQUENCE table
member.param: String Array contianing the names of the fields to update in the WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG. All columns in WSRE_SEQUENCE table are populated hence the field list is stored as private class member and not passed to this function

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper.UpdateInternalLogReturnCode(System.String[])
member.summary: Used at end of each step by WSRE_Processor. Both the WSRE_INTERNAL_LOG and WSRE_SEQUENCE tableare updated. In case the parameter afldList is null only the WSRE_SEQUENCE table is updated.
member.param: Array containing the fields to update

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper.AssignCopyToJob(System.String[],IRU.CommonInterfaces.IDBHelper,IRU.RTS.WSRE.WSRE_COPY_TO_JOB_STRUCT)
member.summary: Insert row into WSRE_COPY_TO_JOB table using the StructToTable class
member.param: String array containing the fields to update

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.InternalDBHelper.CheckIfCopyToIDExists(IRU.CommonInterfaces.IDBHelper,IRU.RTS.WSRE.WSRE_COPY_TO_JOB_STRUCT)
member.summary: Used while assigning the copyto job to see if the copy_to_id is avalid subscriber in the system.
member.returns: true if row exists false otherwise

member.name: M:IRU.RTS.WSRE.WSRE_SEQUENCE_STRUCT.SetMembers(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Set Step, Result, description and LastUpdateTime
